reviews.comments: Departamento muy lindo, cómodo y limpio. Anahí es muy atenta, recomendable!
Excelente TODO !!!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Claudio por tu estadìa, Hasta siempre!!

reviews.comments: Todo fue genial el lugar ,el dto y Anahi muy recomendable
Muy buen alijamiento y buena ubicación. Anfitrionas excelentes.
Muy lindo y prolijo. Bien ubicado. Anahi muy accesible y atenta.
Muy lindo departameto! Excelente ubicación.. muy recomendable!
Excelente.  Recomendable.  muy buena predisposición de parte del propietario.
reviews.response: Muchas Gracias por tu opinión y comentario y por haber sido mis huéspedes! Saludos, Anahí

reviews.comments: MI ESTADIA NO PUDO HABER SIDO MEJOR, Anahí es súper amable atenta y responsable. Respondió todas mis dudas, nos dejó mapas de la ciudad y una sube para manejarnos. El departamento es cómodo e impecable amé la iluminación natural!  y la ubicación es excelente. Sin dudas volveré a hospedarme con ella cuando vuelva a Buenos Aires más que satisfecha con todo.
reviews.response: Querida Georgina, fue un placer que seas mi huèsped, y tu cálido gesto de haberme traído de reglao alfajores santafesinos aún lo sigo disfrutando! Gracias por todos, Hasta siempre

reviews.comments: Excelente Anfitriona La Recomiendo 100%
Un anfitrión muy sispático y servicial. Apartamento muy bien situado. Recomiendo y volveré.
Trato agradable y atento por parte del anfitrión. Buena localización del apartamento. Fue una estancia de 5 noches en Buenos Aires muy recomendable.
Todo perfecto, 100 % recomendable: centrico, limpio y seguro (hay portero). La comunicación también fue impecable.

Excelente departamento!!
100% recomendable
reviews.response: Gracias a Ustedes! Un placer que hayan sido mis huéspedes!

reviews.comments:
Increíble lugar, con todas las comodidades, cerca de todo. 
Anahi nos recibió y explicó todo lo necesario para moverse en la ciudad. Sin duda volveríamos

Apesar de não ter conseguido realizar minha viagem por problemas com minha documentação, Anahi foi atenciosa e preocupada para que tudo desse certo. Mas pretendo ir a BsAs e finalmente conhecer pessoalmente esse espaço!
Everything was perfect. Clean place.  Nice contact. No worries.

(English above)

Se você estava se perguntando se este é o lugar certo para reservar, pare agora, porque é melhor do que você pensa! O apartamento tem tudo o que você pode precisar e muito mais. De instalações a localização, o lugar é perfeito para um casal. Há muitos mercados, metrôs, paradas de ônibus, restaurantes próximos... Também usamos o aplicativo chamado "pedidos ya" uma noite ao invés de sair para comer, e funcionou muito bem. Nós gostamos muito do nosso tempo na cidade e isso se deve especialmente por conta do apartamento, responsável por fazer com que a gente se sentisse como em casa todos os dias depois de um longo período de tempo na cidade. Anahi é um super-anfitrião e nos recebeu com café e lanches, bem como uma recepção calorosa, excelentes dicas sobre as principais atrações turísticas e um cartão de sube - o que nos salvou desde que chegamos no domingo e quase todos os quiosques foram fechados. Eu poderia enfatizar muitas coisas incríveis no apartamento, mas nunca deixaria de digitar, então vou destacar o banho, incrível, se você quiser relaxar depois de um dia cansativo na cidade. Se você está visitando no verão, você também pode relaxar na piscina, realmente refrescante à tarde. Espero que voltemos algum dia. Obrigado, Anahi!

If you were asking yourself if this is the right place to book, stop right now, because it the even better than you think! The apartment has everything you can need and more. From facilities to location, the place is perfect for a couple. There are many markets nearby, subways, bus stops, restaurants... We also used the app called "pedidos ya" once in place of going out to eat, and it worked really well. We enjoyed our time so much in the city especially because of the apartment, which felt like home every day after a long time hanging out in the city. Anahi is a super host and received us with coffee and snacks, as well as a warm welcome, great tips about the main touristic attractions and a sube card - which saved us since we arrived on Sunday and almost all kioskos were closed. I could emphasize many incredible things in the apartment, but I would never stop typing, so I'll highlight the shower, incredible if you want to relax after a tiring day in the city. If you are visiting in summer, you can also relax in the swimming pool, really refreshing in the afternoon. Hope we go back someday. Thank you, Anahi!

Fomos muito bem recebidas e orientadas a respeito da cidade. O apartamento cumpre com tudo que promete, é aconchegante e a localização é excelente. Ficamos muito satisfeitas com nossa estadia em Buenos Aires e também com a agilidade para a comunicação e organização com Anahi. 
Gratas por toda  atenção.
My husband and I really enjoyed the studio. We were in bicycle and could go everywhere from there, really nice location. Andrea and Anahi were very friendly and helpful.

Thanks for hosting us, it was great. Location is amazing close to buses and subway even though it is not really required because location is walking distance to top sightseeing, even waking to Boca and Caminito is walkable. There are many convenience stores in less than 200m and the parrillas recommendatio was great. Anahi borrowed us a SUBE card for public transportation, so we just had to put some money on it, this was very convenient for us
Apparemment tres bien situé mais bruyant  Quartier agréable avec toutes commodités   Anahi est tres chaleureuse  .

Unfortunately my stay got cut short because of flights being cancelled, so I didn’t get to stay the night, but I did meet Anahi for checkin (she is very friendly) and see the apartment, which was very nice, also.

Firstly, after a 13 hour overnight flight meeting Anah was like a breath of fresh air! She’s very welcoming, bubbly and always available if you need help. Check in was easy and she helped us with any questions about the city. The apartment itself was perfect - great location close to public transport and easy to get to anywhere in the city, spacious and clean, and the concierge were friendly. I will definitely stay here again, Anah has been one of the best hosts we’ve had. Well done!
reviews.response: Thank you very much Farhana! It was my pleasure!!!!   :)

reviews.comments:
A localização é ótima para quem busca proximidade e mobilidade para os principais pontos turísticos e cafés. O apartamento tem diversos itens de cozinha e até liquidificador, tudo bem organizado e prático para aproveitar a estadia em Buenos Aires. Anahi nos recebeu com muita hospitalidade e dicas.

The apartment has a great location if you are looking for proximity and mobility to reach the main touristic places in BA. The apartment is very organized and practical to enjoy your stay in BA. Anahi had been waiting for us with hospitality and useful tips.
Apartamento localizado entre duas estações de metrô em região central, muito bom. =)

Every description about the apartment was perfectly accurate! The apartment is great and the perfect space for what we wanted during our stay. We didn't get to meet Anahi as she was away but her friend Andrea patiently waited for us at the apartment after our flight was delayed and was the perfect host. We were in contact before our visit and Andrea gave us lots of advice on how to get there from the airport etc and even booked a taxi for us back to the airport on our departure. The communal pool was an added bonus and the security guards were nice. Local food market just down the road with local restaurants/food chains close by. Anahi had subway maps in the flat and subway cards which were so handy and a great way to commute around the city. Overall the flat really enhanced our stay in Buenos Aires!
Centrally located, close to metro, doorman, pool. Accurate pictures. Nice and helpful hostess. No complaints.

This is such a great little apartment with everything you need. Anahi is nice, welcoming and so helpful providing map and directions around the city. The apartment is nice, good for two people and very secure. There is some noise from traffic in the morning which comes with central city location. Would highly recommend and certainly stay again!

The apartment's location is great. You have two subway lines within a walking distance of two minutes and all the busses that take you to the other touristic places are also pretty close. 
The check in and everything was perfect. Anahí gave us really good information about where to go and how to get there. Really enjoyed our time in BA and that was especially because of the great apartment. Once we will be back in BA we will definitely book this one again.
reviews.response: Thank you very much! And if you will return I sure rent you :)

reviews.comments: Fiquei por 20 dias no apartamento de Anahí e foi ótimo, não tenho nada a reclamar.  O apartamento tem ótima localização, perto de metro, linhas de ônibus,  supermercado, restaurantes e a região é segura. Os porteiros são atenciosos. O apartamento tem todos os utensílios, é muito limpo e confortável e Anahí sempre muito prestativa e atenciosa. Gracias Anahí
Perfect location, beautiful apartment (very accurate photos) wonderful balcony view, kind doormen and fantastic host. Thank you so much for everything, I hope to see you again someday.
